src.stt.predict module¶

Description:

Predict the transcription of an audio file

Usage:

$ python src/data/predict.py -h or -w

Possible arguments:

  • -h or –hubert: Use Hubert model

  • -w or –wav2vec2: Use Wav2Vec2 model

src.stt.predict.transcribe_audio(pipe: Pipeline, rec: Recognizer) → None¶

Transcribe audio from a microphone

Parameters:

  • pipe (Pipeline) – Speech recognition pipeline

  • rec (sr.Recognizer) – Speech recognition recognizer
